posts.post_title: WTB T206 Green Portrait,  Bat On, Bat Off, Red Portrait
posts.post_content: Looking for any of the T206 Ty Cobb variations.  Prefer PSA or SGC but will also look at others.  Please email me with anything you are looking to sell!
